mapper.sql: id, phone, member_id as memberId, have_receive as haveReceive, house_id as houseId, city_id as cityId, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, red_pack_rule_id as redPackRuleId, red_pack_id as redPackId, business_order_number as businessOrderNumber, data_status as dataStatus, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate
mapper.select: SELECT rpr.id, rpr.sort, rpr.pack_num packNum, (case when rpr.member_id!=null then 1 else 0 end) isReceived, (case when rpr.business_order_number!=null then 1 else 0 end) isApply, rpr.have_receive haveReceive, rpr.business_order_number businessOrderNumber FROM dj_activity_red_pack_record rpr WHERE rpr.red_pack_id = #{redPackId} order by rpr.sort

SELECT p.id, p.`name`, p.from_object_type fromObjectType, p.from_object fromObject, p.storefront_id storefrontId, p.from_object_name fromObjectName, IFNULL(p.satisfy_money,0) satisfyMoney, p.type, ( CASE WHEN ( (p.type = 0 || p.type = 1) AND p.satisfy_money > 0 ) THEN CONCAT('满',p.satisfy_money,'元可用') ELSE '无门槛' END ) satisfyMoneyRemark, ( CASE WHEN p.source_type = 1 THEN '平台券' WHEN p.source_type = 2 THEN '店铺券' END ) typeName,
( CASE WHEN r.business_order_number!=null THEN '已使用' else '已失效' END ) statusName,
p.satisfy_money, p.money, p.source_type sourceType, c.`name` cityName, p.start_date startDate, p.end_date endDate FROM dj_activity_red_pack p, dj_activity_red_pack_record r, dj_other_city c WHERE r.red_pack_id = p.id AND p.city_id = c.id
AND p.end_date >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and r.business_order_number is null
AND( p.end_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') or r.business_order_number is not null)
AND p.start_date <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND p.end_date >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and r.business_order_number is null
AND r.member_id = #{memberId}
and p.source_type=#{sourceType}
order by r.modify_date desc

SELECT count(r.id) FROM dj_activity_red_pack p, dj_activity_red_pack_record r WHERE r.red_pack_id = p.id AND r.member_id = #{memberId}
and p.source_type=#{sourceType}
